subLabels.text: (i) point paper designing:  plain, twill, satin/sateen and variations
(ii) looms and accessories:  types of loom (man power ,traditional, broad loom and power looms :eg. shuttleand shuttle less loom and accessories)
(iii) textile calculations:  weight/cost of warp, weft and fabric
(iv) weaving:  processes (traditional and broad loom) i.e
Beaming, heddling, reeding, tying up, bobbin winding, etc.  loom motions (primary, secondary and auxiliary motion)
(v) other fabric construction processes i.e: knitting, crocheting and tapestry
